answers.answer: I'm finding it hard to sort out your meds and doses at present. Your lab results are disconcerting. You should see the doc who prescribed your meds to discuss the results and follow up as necessary. If that doc is beyond your means, find a community health care center or similar facility where fees are adjusted based on income (many hospitals do this if you ask) and work with them.

question: i HAVE EPILEPSY FOR FOR 18 YEARS . i`VE BEEN ON ZONEGRAN 500 MG FOR THE PAST 5 MONTHS I BELEILIEVE . I BLACKOUT OUT LAST YEAR . I STOPED TAKING MY MEDS.
